title: Secli - Transfer Swift Address Data to Engine

task_list.instruction_title:
Please Send Swift address to Engine : FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_060_ADR_SWIFT to moteur




Detailed instruction; 

one 1 unix server having data, run the following:
cd $DATA
. ~/.sybaserc.sh
bcp exabn..sgh_FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_060_ADR_SWIFT out FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_060_ADR_SWIFT.csv -t \; -S $DDSQUERY -U $dbaname -P \"$dbapwd\"  -c -r \\n
. $TRAITEMENT/cfg/.ftp
scp FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_060_ADR_SWIFT.csv $ftpusr@$ftpsrv:$ftpdir_push
ssh $ftpusr@$ftpsrv \"chmod 666 $ftpdir_push/FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_060_ADR_SWIFT.csv\"
